title: Electrical Mash Mixing Paddle ~ Brewing Aid

tasks.task: Assembling and modifying a mash tun mixing paddle.
subtasks: Inspecting delivered steel components.
Preparing a welding table for the project.
Cutting threaded bar with a grinding disk.
Welding a mixing paddle to a shaft.
Applying protective coating to prevent rust.
Aligning and attaching the paddle to the mash tun.

tasks.task: Reviewing and collaborating on home brewing projects.
subtasks: Construction of a homebrewing stairs project.
Discussing and troubleshooting brewing component installations.
Sharing homemade cider and beers for feedback.
Planning Christmas beer tasting videos.

tasks.task: Documenting learning and problem-solving in home brewing.
subtasks: Videotaping the process of building a mash tun mixer.

Sharing feedback on received homebrews and personal diet progress.
